Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.text

Class Text

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.text.Text
public class Text extends Object
Represents a piece of text with styled sections.
Author:
Pim

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Gets the length of the raw text without any styles applied to it.
      Returns:

    • getStyledLength

      public int getStyledLength()
      The length of the text including all the styles.
      Returns:
      The length of the text including all the styles.

    • subsection

      @Contract("_, _ -> this") public Text subsection(int start, int end)
      Gets a subsection from this Text.

      See StringBuilder.substring(int, int).

      Any styles/decorators that have at least 1 character inside this range will be copied.

      Parameters:
      start - The beginning index, inclusive.
      end - The ending index, exclusive.
      Returns:
      The Text in the given range.

    • append

      @Contract("_ -> this") public Text append(String text)
      Appends some unstyled text to the current text.
      Parameters:
      text - The unstyled text to add.
      Returns:
      The current Text instance.

    • append

      @Contract("_ -> this") public Text append(char ch)
      Appends some unstyled character to the current text.
      Parameters:
      ch - The unstyled character to add.
      Returns:
      The current Text instance.

    • append

      @Contract("_, _ -> this") public Text append(String text, @Nullable @Nullable TextType type)
      Appends some styled text to the current text.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to add.
      type - The TextType of the text to add. The colorScheme will be used to look up the style associated with the type. See ColorScheme.getStyle(TextType).
      Returns:
      The current Text instance.

    • prepend

      @Contract("_ -> this") public Text prepend(Text other)
      Prepends another Text object to this object, so the other text is placed before the current one.

      The other Text instance is not modified.

      Parameters:
      other - The Text to insert before the current Text.
      Returns:
      The current Text instance.

    • append

      @Contract("_ -> this") public Text append(Text other)
      Appends another Text object to this one.

      The other Text object will not be modified.

      Parameters:
      other - The other Text instance to append to the current one.
      Returns:
      The current Text instance.
